algorithm:
New algorithm description: The new algorithm assigns a score of 1 to bins with the same capacity as the item, assigns a score based on the ratio of the item size to the remaining capacity of the bins, and sets the scores of bins that are not used to a large negative value.

Code:
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    # Calculate the remaining capacity of the bins
    remaining_capacity = bins - item
    
    # Create an array 'scores' with the size of 'bins' and initialize it with a large negative value
    scores = np.full_like(bins, -np.inf)
    
    # Assign a score of 1 to bins that have the same capacity as the item
    scores[remaining_capacity == 0] = 1
    
    # Assign a score based on the ratio of the item size to the remaining capacity of the bins
    scores[remaining_capacity > 0] = item / remaining_capacity[remaining_capacity > 0]
    
    return scores
